messages.message: Hey Austria! How's it going? I am hoping we can work together on this one. No point getting into any early conflict which will only serve to help everyone else. How do you like to split up the Balkans?
messages.input: My response to AUSTRIA:'Hey Austria! How's it going? I am hoping we can work together on this one. No point getting into any early conflict which will only serve to help everyone else. How do you like to split up the Balkans?'.

messages.message: Hi Turkey! I fully agree that we should stay peaceful with eachother. How do you like the sound of you getting Greece and Bulgaria and I'll go for Romania and Serbia?
messages.input: Message from AUSTRIA:'Hi Turkey! I fully agree that we should stay peaceful with eachother. How do you like the sound of you getting Greece and Bulgaria and I'll go for Romania and Serbia?'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. Austria's agreement to stay peaceful and proposing a fair distribution of territories in the Balkans aligns with the cooperative and non-confrontational approach suggested by Turkey initially. This response indicates a genuine interest in collaboration and a diplomatic effort to establish a mutually beneficial arrangement at the early stages of the game.

messages.message: That sounds good. If we stick together we can get through this early game intact. What's your read on Russia and Italy? Have you heard from them?

messages.message: Ah well our biggest issue is keeping Russia out of Rumania. I will see if they have plans to move most units south. It sounds like they might be.

messages.message: Russia is planning to take you out as soon as possible, and is asking me to help. How do you feel about moving against Russia, as I believe that he will be the biggest threat to the two of us. He is really posturing in his communications with me

messages.output: You should be cautious and not fully trust the message. It is crucial to carefully consider the motives behind this change in approach and assess whether it truly serves the best interests of the alliance or if there may be alternative motivations at play.
